1118650.name: RPG Paper Maker - Commercial edition
1118650.description:
This product is the commercial edition of RPG Paper Maker.

There are no feature differences between free and commercial versions of RPG Paper Maker.

This DLC only provides you rights to publish commercial games made with RPG Paper Maker, this can also be a way to support the project by any way!
1118650.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 繁体中文, 日语, 波兰语, 乌克兰语, 德语, 韩语, 俄语, 意大利语
